metadata.title: CVE-2023-52525 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:mwifiex: Fix oob check condition in mwifiex_process_rx_packet Only skip thecode path trying to access the rfc1042 headers when the buffer is toosmall, so the driver can still process packets without rfc1042 headers.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
